about.title: We Help To Get The Best Job And Find A Talent
about.description: Searching for and starting a new job takes courage and discipline. While you may also feel excited about the future, reading something inspirational can help you feel more confident in your abilities
about.point2: FiveItViec - where you truly find yourself

carousel.title: Find The Perfect Job That You Deserved
carousel.description: Embark on a journey to discover the job that resonates with your aspirations and expertise, a role you genuinely deserve.

readMore.header: We Help To Get The Best Job And Find A Talent
readMore.paragraph1: Embark on a journey to explore roles perfectly aligned with your aspirations and expertise. Let us guide you in discovering the ideal job opportunities or sourcing exceptional talent effortlessly.
readMore.listItems1: Find roles tailored to your expertise

testimonial.client1: Always reliable and fast, even after I leave for the day, I can always count on you guys to get requests done. Thank you!
testimonial.client2: Excellent service. Quick response, efficient troubleshooting and resolution with full explanation of the problem. Gotta love FiveITViec!
testimonial.client3: I just wanted to take a minute to let you know how helpful your office was in a time of near desperation. The people that I have dealt with have helped make my job much easier.

validationErrors.phoneNumberInvalid: Phone number must be numeric and has to be greater than 10 or less than 12

requirements.requirements1: Competitive salary based on performance and highest in the IT industry

qualifications.qualifications1: At least 2 years of project experience (Highly prefer candidates with extensive experience)
qualifications.qualifications4: English communication at an intermediate level (TOEIC score of 550 or equivalent certificates, or confident in English communication)

right.detail: Searching for and starting a new job takes courage and discipline. While you may also feel excited about the future, reading something inspirational can help you feel more confident in your abilities

company.description: Companies, whether large corporations or small startup are thebackbone of the global business landscape. They serve as engines of economic growth, providing goods and services that meet theneeds and desires of consumers worldwide.
company.noCompany: At the moment, there are no available companies that meet your requirements

overview.overview1: As a Digital Transformation Expert (DX) and Digital Growth Partner,
overview.overview2: We dedicate our DX skills to helping large customers succeed.
overview.overview3: leads in providing the best working environment for employees
overview.overview4: Top office: Office on the 35th floor of Keangnam building, beautiful view and modern space
overview.overview5: Top equipment: Each employee is equipped with the latest generation LG Gram laptop and modern LG screen
overview.overview6: Best working mode: Work 8 hours/day, from 8:30 to 5:30. No OT, no overtime on weekends!
overview.overview7: Employees are like family: Working with Korea's top experts, youthful, modern, fair working style!
overview.overview8: Best remuneration: Salary deal based on ability, fixed PI bonus of 150% of salary Incentive, Lunch allowance, transportation, phone bill. Party with the team once a month, Workshop travel for the whole company once a year. Rewarding gifts on holidays, International Labor Day, International Women's Day, etc

blogBanner.description: As an IT business, you have a wealth of highly specialized knowledge that is valuable to industries and professionals of all types. One of the best ways to share your expertise and build lasting connections is by starting an IT company blog. You might even have a long list of IT blog ideas in the back of your mind that you could sit down and write today.

blogDetail.title: Blog Detail
blogDetail.description: As an IT business, you have a wealth of highly specialized knowledge that is valuable to industries and professionals of all types. One of the best ways to share your expertise and build lasting connections is by starting an IT company blog. You might even have a long list of IT blog ideas in the back of your mind that you could sit down and write today.

left.qoute: Management truly cares about employees and treats them with respect.
left.point1: Friendly colleagues and a good working environment. A collaborative culture, friendly colleagues, and well-equipped offices.
left.point2: What do the best IT companies have in common?
left.point3: Learning opportunities. Exposure to new technologies, training, fast career advancement opportunities, and technical challenges.
left.point4: How did FiveITViec select winning companies?
left.point5: FiveITViec selects winning companies based on over 8,000 company reviews on FiveITViec posted by IT employees.
left.point6: The 'Best IT Company' award winners have received high scores and detailed positive reviews from their employees.
